title: Find cases — find_case
text: Identify cases FMDS dataset. Three possible methods used: Keep found FMDS found FMDS Somatic date health institution matched multiple registeries FMDS similar dates health institution, keep earlier date mulitple registeries FMDS date different health institutions, check Somatic data. Matching health institution kept.

title: Find cases — find_case
code: find_case(   d1,   d2,   id = "lopenr",   skade = "skadeDato",   rhf = "helseforetak_nr",   filter = NULL,   days = 3,   verbose = FALSE,   clean = FALSE )

title: Find cases — find_case
text: d1 Dataset FMDS ie. external explanation injury d2 Dataset NPR ie. intery registration injury id Unique patient identity skade Coloumn name date injury rhf Coloumn name health institutions filter Column name filtering inclusion exclusion ie. .na(filter) days selected time period consider similar injury eg. 3 days verbose Keep variables making selection ie. xx.VariableName produce DELXX clean Delete possible duplicated cases
